item.description: Okay. We are going to hook up with a member who has started a gay photography meet-up. (Maria) 3 groups will be joining in for this meet-up. Bring a dog if you have one or just want to hang out and play and have some icecream that's okay too. Bring your camera to take pictures! Pack a lunch too if you want. We will meet at the icecream stand at 11:00. Off of 146 take Purgatory Chasm exit and take a left and the stand will be up on the right. Hope for a nice day and hopefully see some of you there!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Women-Dogs-Icecream-Photography
